summary: This is a brief email transmitting the Office of Professional Responsibility's (OPR) final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter to the Southern District of New York (SDNY). It includes two attachments: the report itself and a transmittal letter.

events.title: Transmittal of OPR Epstein Final Report
events.description: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) transmits its final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter to the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

keyFacts: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) completed a final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter.
The report was transmitted to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) on November 12, 2020.
The transmission included two attachments: the final report and a transmittal letter.
